title: Naturalba
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian store carries a large variety of food, and ingredients to prepare, mostly organic: sausages, burgers, spreads, gluten, seitan, tofu, soy cream. Also sells a variety of whole fresh breads, flours and pasta, all seeds, legumes and cereals. Most macrobiotic cooking ingredients, like kudzu, algae, umeboshi, tahini (sesame spread), tamari, etc. A store designed for vegetarians and vegans by other vegetarians and vegans.
